Thu Dec 28 02:56:20 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš export PKG_CONFIG_PATH=/opt/lib/pkgconfig:/usr/lib/pkgconfig
ğŸš export CFLAGS=-I/opt/include 
ğŸš export LDFLAGS=-L/opt/lib 
ğŸš mktemp -d
ğŸš cd
ğŸš curl -fsSLO https://github.com/Old-Man-Programmer/tree/archive/refs/tags/2.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš echo 1b70253994dca48a59d6ed99390132f4d55c486bf0658468f8520e7e63666a06  2.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš tee SHA256SUM
ğŸš cat SHA256SUM
ğŸš shasum -c SHA256SUM
ğŸš rm SHA256SUM
ğŸš tar -xf 2.1.1.tar.gz
ğŸš cd tree-2.1.1
ğŸš make -j8
ğŸš sudo make MANDIR=/opt/package/tree-2.1.1/share/man PREFIX=/opt/package/tree-2.1.1 install
ğŸš rm -rf
